languages.text: The last shot in the clip of this shotgun ignores armour and immobilizes targets who failed AGI test.

traits.locale_text: The last shot in the clip of this shotgun ignores armour and immobilizes targets who failed AGI test.

languages.text: When shooting the last shell from this shotgun, this shot ignores the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. That target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.
languages.original_text: Выстрел из этого оружия игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} цели, если это последний заряд в магазине. Цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала становится {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиженной{/g}.

traits.locale_text: When the last pellet from this shotgun's magazine is shot, that shot ignores the target's armour. That target must pass an Agility resistance test or become immobilised.

When shooting the last shell from this shotgun, this shot ignores the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. That target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

When shooting the last shell from this shotgun, this shot ignores the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. That target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

languages.text: Bu pompalıda kalan son fişek ateşlendiğinde atış, hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırhını{/g} yok sayar. Hedef, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} olur.
languages.original_text: When shooting the last shell from this shotgun, this shot ignores the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. That target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Bu pompalıda kalan son fişek ateşlendiğinde atış, hedefin zırhını yok sayar. Hedef, Çeviklik direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde felç olur.

Bu pompalıda kalan son fişek ateşlendiğinde atış, hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırhını{/g} yok sayar. Hedef, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde felç olur.

languages.text: Cuando se dispara el último cartucho de esta escopeta, el disparo ignora la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} del objetivo, que además debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} para no quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g}.
languages.original_text: When shooting the last shell from this shotgun, this shot ignores the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. That target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando se dispara el último cartucho de esta escopeta, el disparo ignora la armadura del objetivo, que además debe superar una prueba de fortaleza de Agilidad para no quedar inmovilizado.

languages.text: 当这把霰弹枪射出最后一发子弹时，此次攻击无视目标{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}。此外，被攻击的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态。
languages.original_text: When shooting the last shell from this shotgun, this shot ignores the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. That target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当这把霰弹枪射出最后一发子弹时，此次攻击无视目标护甲。此外，被攻击的目标需要进行敏捷抗性检定，若未能通过检定，则会陷入定身状态。

languages.text: Ce tir ignore l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armure{/g} de la cible s'il utilise la dernière cartouche du fusil à pompe. La cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, sans quoi elle est {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisée{/g}.
languages.original_text: When shooting the last shell from this shotgun, this shot ignores the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. That target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Ce tir ignore l'Armure de la cible s'il utilise la dernière cartouche du fusil à pompe. La cible doit réussir un test de résistance d'Agilité, sans quoi elle est immobilisée.

languages.text: このショットガンの最後のシェルは、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を無視する。そのターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる。
languages.original_text: When shooting the last shell from this shotgun, this shot ignores the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. That target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: このショットガンの最後のシェルは、ターゲットのアーマーを無視する。そのターゲットは敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると移動不可になる。
このショットガンの最後のシェルは、ターゲットのアーマーを無視する。そのターゲットは敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると移動不可になる。

languages.text: Wird die letzte Patrone dieser Schrotflinte abgefeuert, ignoriert der Schuss die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} des Ziels. Das Ziel muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} bestehen, um nicht {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} zu werden.
languages.original_text: When shooting the last shell from this shotgun, this shot ignores the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. That target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wird die letzte Patrone dieser Schrotflinte abgefeuert, ignoriert der Schuss die Rüstung des Ziels. Das Ziel muss eine Widerstandsprobe auf Beweglichkeit bestehen, um nicht gelähmt zu werden.

languages.text: Выстрел из этого оружия игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} цели, если это последний заряд в магазине. Цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала становится {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиженной{/g}.
languages.original_text: When shooting the last shell from this shotgun, this shot ignores the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. That target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Выстрел из этого оружия игнорирует броню цели, если это последний заряд в магазине. Цель выполняет проверку Ловкости на сопротивление и в случае провала становится обездвиженной.
Выстрел из этого оружия игнорирует броню цели, если это последний заряд в магазине. Цель выполняет проверку Ловкости на сопротивление и в случае провала становится обездвиженной.
